name: Nellie K. WEST v. Paul R. BRIDGE, Jr. and Betty Bridge, his wife, Appellants

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: Nellie K. WEST v. Paul R. BRIDGE, Jr. and Betty Bridge, his wife, Appellants.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
JONES, C. J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Richard H. Ferguson, Latrobe, for appellants.
Gay B. Banes, Bernard J. McGowan, McKeesport, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
346 A.2d 63
Nellie K. WEST v. Paul R. BRIDGE, Jr. and Betty Bridge, his wife, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 23, 1975.
Decided Oct. 30, 1975.
Richard H. Ferguson, Latrobe, for appellants.
Gay B. Banes, Bernard J. McGowan, McKeesport, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
